description: This course develops and stimulates research into the emotional/expressive properties of
art-making in the painting media. By investigating thematic compositional and technical problems,
students develop a personalized approach to ideas and content. Students learn the importance
of process, need for flexibility, how to seek alternatives and how to recognize that a painting has
a life of its own. Prerequisites: Art 111 and 112 (or 110), and 113.  Materials fee.  Offered
